price: Dan Kami telah meniupkan angin untuk mengawinkan435) dan Kami turunkan hujan dari langit, lalu Kami beri kamu minum dengan (air) itu, dan bukanlah kamu yang menyimpannya.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnā al-riyāḥa lawāqiḥa fa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan fa-asqaynākumūhu wamā antum lahu bikhāzinīna
translations: and We gave it to you to drink
